== Who I am ==
My name is Dimitris Kavroudakis. Active member of the Ubuntu-gr (Greece) team and localisation contributor for the Greek language. I'm a research assistant with academic interests: Computational Geography, GIS, Computational Algorithms and microsimulation. I am involved with FOSS the last 5 years.
